actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution commemorating the 90th anniversary, on November 5, 1975, of the birth of Will Durant and honoring his contributions to the interpretation and understanding of history.

summary.text: States that the Senate commemorates the ninetieth anniversary, on November 5, 1975, of the birth of Will Durant and honors his contributions to the interpretation and understanding of history.

titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 90th anniversary, on November 5, 1975, of the birth of Will Durant and honoring his contributions to the interpretation and understanding of history.
